about_the_game:
It's time to use your bow and your whip!

Cadenced battle, special weapons, magic points and all the feel of the classic battle against evil is here.

Play as Countess Lucy, a demon hunter seeking a cure for her curse, traveling through infested lands in search of an ancient evil. Countess Lucy will meet other travelers who can help on this journey.

But be aware: in these lands, everyone has their purpose.

Switch between these characters to use unique abilities. Summon skeletons, set traps, heal yourself and much more.

Darkest Abyss is a platform/action game inspired by the Classic-Vania genre.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04 or CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ or Vulkan capable
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gnome desktop environment running on top of X11 windowing system Other configuration and user environment as provided stock with the supported distribution (such as Kernel or Compositor)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Apple officially supported drivers
